opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with larceny, receiving stolen goods, and conspiracy. Before GREENBERG, J. Appeals, Nos. 331 and 332, Oct. T., 1967, from judgment of sentence of Court of Quarter Sessions of Philadelphia County, Feb. T., 1966, Nos. 897 and 898. Submitted June 13, 1967.
opinion.attorneys: William Stewart andMelvin Dildine, Assistant Defenders, and Herman I. Pollock, Defender, for appellant; Michael M. Baylson and Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
